Class GamePanels

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.observer.Observer
      • com.risk.view.GamePanels
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InitializeData, MapValidator, StartUpPhase

    public class GamePanels
extends Observer
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener
    User Interface for Game Play

                                                         int fill,
                                                         int anchor,
                                                         double wx,
                                                         double wy,
                                                         int x,
                                                         int y)
        The GridBagConstraints is used specifies constraints for components that are laid out using the GridBagLayout class. Initialize GridBagConstraint object with all of its fields set to their default value.
        Parameters:
        insets - The initial insets value
        fill - The initial fill value
        anchor - The initial anchor value.
        wx - The initial weightx value.
        wy - The initial weighty value.
        x - The initial gridx value.
        y - The initial gridy value.
        Returns:
        GridBagConstraints object with all of its fields set to the passed-in arguments

        public void startPlayingGame()
        This Method is used to start playing game with map in Single mode or Tournament Mode.

      • tournamentEnd

        public void tournamentEnd()
        This method checks whether tournament ends or not. If tournament not end, it start playing game again with map.

        Method is used to change the Turn of player when End Turn Button is Clicked.

      • checkTurnNumber

        public void checkTurnNumber()
        This method is used to check whether game is draw or not. If it's draw, it will go for playing game with map otherwise it will continue with current game only.

      • checkCardCombination

        public boolean checkCardCombination(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cardList,
                                    java.lang.String card1,
                                    java.lang.String card2,
                                    java.lang.String card3)

        Parameters:
        cardList - list of cards.
        card1 - card type
        card2 - card type
        card3 - card type
        Returns:
        true when any of the combination matches Otherwise false
